Section.Catchline: Injunction or restraining order with respect to funds transfer.

SectionBody.Text: For proper cause and in compliance with applicable law, a court may restrain:

Subsection.Text: A person from issuing a payment order to initiate a funds transfer;
An originator’s bank from executing the payment order of the originator; or
The beneficiary’s bank from releasing funds to the beneficiary or the beneficiary from withdrawing the funds.

SectionBody.Text: A court may not otherwise restrain a person from issuing a payment order, paying or receiving payment of a payment order, or otherwise acting with respect to a funds transfer.
